thread.title: Apple adds Retina displays to its iMacs - Chico Enterprise-Record
thread.title_full: Apple adds Retina displays to its iMacs - Chico Enterprise-Record - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Chico Enterprise-Record
title: Apple adds Retina displays to its iMacs - Chico Enterprise-Record
text:
Apple is adding Retina displays to its iMacs, which will enhance the text and the image quality of photos and videos. The Cupertino, California-based company said its 21.5-inch iMac will have a Retina 4K display, while every 27-inch iMac will have a Retina 5K display.
 Chico Enterprise-Record.
